General.Name: GeneFerm Biotechnology Co Ltd
General.Description: GeneFerm Biotechnology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, markets, and sells fermented health care products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers microbial fermentation products, which includes nattokinase, red yeast rice, vitamin K2, lactic acid bacteria, etc.; and edible and medicinal mushroom fermentation, functional herbal products, fruit and vegetable fermentation concentrates, and protein products and private label supplements. It also provides microbial fermentation toll manufacturing and technical consulting services. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.3, Dali 2nd Road, Tainan City, Taiwan, 741014
